definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to listen to the next chapter for an explanation
pinyin: qie3 ting1 xia4 hui2 fen1 jie3

definition: catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation

sentences.english: But this kind of catabolism mainly concentrates on the banana skin.
sentences.chinese: 而这种分解代谢主要集中在香蕉皮上。

sentences.english: First, break up the main task into data- or functionally-independent subtasks.
sentences.chinese: 首先，将主任务分解为数据或功能独立的子任务。

sentences.english: It can be broken down to yield acetoacetate.
sentences.chinese: 它可以被分解成乙酰乙酸。

sentences.english: A novel pixel-level image fusion scheme based on gradient pyramid decomposition is presented.
sentences.chinese: 给出了基于梯度塔形分解的像素级图像融合新方法。

sentences.english: The element K promotes the dissociation of acetylene on Ru(1010)surface.
sentences.chinese: 碱金属K的存在促进了乙炔的分解。

sentences.english: The gall bladder stores and discharges the bile, which helps to break down fats into minute droplets.
sentences.chinese: 胆囊储存和释放胆汁，协助脂肪分解为微小的颗粒。

sentences.english: Break the task down into little bits of time. Make it a game.
sentences.chinese: 把任务分解成小段的时间，把它当成游戏。

sentences.english: In this paper, a fast algorithm for the fractal signal wavelet decomposition and reconstruction is put foreward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了分形信号的小波分解与重构的一种快速算法。

sentences.english: Elementary transformation method of full rank decomposition of matrix and triangular decomposition of strongly full rank matrix;
sentences.chinese: 这些方法都是基于网关联矩阵的满秩分解。

sentences.english: The target feature extracting adopts Wavelet Packet Decomposing and Bispectrum Estimation these two methods.
sentences.chinese: 目标特征提取采用了小波包分解和双谱估计两种方法。

sentences.english: By going low-level, you can play back the individual components of a mouse click.
sentences.chinese: 通过进入低级，您可以回放一个鼠标点击分解动作。

sentences.english: The second step is the conversion of decomposed matter to organic acids.
sentences.chinese: 第二个步骤是将已分解的物质转化为有机酸。

sentences.english: Sampling space is split directly instead of using the mask of the refinable function.
sentences.chinese: 采样空间被直接分解来取代对加细函数的符号分解。

sentences.english: Sampling space is split directly instead of using the mask of the refinable function.
sentences.chinese: 采样空间被直接分解来取代对加细函数的符号分解。

sentences.english: Use of ultrasonic energy forces to dissolve CO2 into gas bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 利用超声波能将二氧化碳分解成气泡。

sentences.english: It will break down the toughest grease and grime.

definition: catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
to adhere to a surface/to absorb/to draw in/(fig.) to attract/(chemistry) adsorption
